title: We love... Fashion fixes for the week ahead – in pictures
text:
Sweet success

Italian brand Tod’s has teamed up with the former Lanvin designer Alber Elbaz. September sees the second drop of the collaboration – Tod’s Happy Moments. The collection includes handbags and footwear in new fabrics, such as neoprene for a tech feel. Look for metallic loafers in sweet-wrapper colours. Delicious!
